articles.title: Margot Robbie channels Barbie at CinemaCon with Ryan Gosling - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 32-year-old Australian actress wowed at the event with a baby pink ensemble that showed off her incredibly toned physique.
articles.content:
Margot Robbie nailed Barbie-chic on Tuesday as she promoted her hotly-anticipated new film with co-star Ryan Gosling and director Greta Gerwig at CinemaCon.

articles.title: Barbie with Down's syndrome on sale after 'real women' criticism - BBC
articles.description: Mattel says it wants children to see themselves in Barbie and also play with dolls who do not look like them.
articles.content:
A Barbie with Down's syndrome is the latest doll to be released by Mattel in a bid to make its range more diverse.
The US toy giant had faced previous criticism that the traditional Barbie did not r… [+3193 chars]

articles.title: Grimes says anyone can use her voice for AI-generated songs - BBC
articles.description: The pop singer invites creators to generate new music using software trained on her voice.
articles.content:
Grimes has invited musicians to clone her voice using Artificial Intelligence in order to create new songs.
